lead_paragraph: European blue-chip stocks Nestle, Royal Dutch Shell, Novartis and Unilever are expected to be among the best income-producing stocks of 2017, Barron's said in a report.
snippet: European blue-chip stocks Nestle, Royal Dutch Shell, Novartis and Unilever are expected to be among the best income-producing stocks of 2017, Barron's said in a report....

headline.main: European Blue Chip Stocks Offer Great Income Opportunities-Barron's
headline.print_headline: European Blue Chip Stocks Offer Great Income Opportunities-Barron's
